job.title: Site Reliability Engineer (L2)
job.description: <p>ShortList Austin are working with a rapidly expanding Tech company that are looking to hire a Site Reliability Engineer (L2).</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Responsibilities</u></strong></p><ul><li>Design, Build, Evolve and Operate SRE-owned services for the team.</li><li>Provide L2 support for Engineering and Development teams.</li><li>Offer improvements to existing service with the aim to provide self-service to customers.</li><li>Collaborate with Tech Leads on designs and advise on implementation.</li><li>Lower support/toil tasks utilizing automation.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>The Ideal candidate</u></strong></p><ul><li>Produces clear designs and communicates them clearly to consumers.</li><li>Produces designs that improve performance/reliability.</li><li>Releases are automated, pass through CI/CD and SDLC and contain unit tests for critical components and performance thresholds.</li><li>Refactors critical production services with regular cadence, improving MTBI and MTTR.</li><li>Provides real-time visibility for the health of production services.</li><li>Standardizes use cases generating less measurable issues with releases.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>The Ideal person</u></strong></p><ul><li>Results orientated.</li><li>Excellent attention to detail.</li><li>Able to prioritize effectively.</li><li>Able to communicate with Technical/non-technical people.</li><li>Able to escalate effectively when working on solutions.</li><li>Strong experience with distributed systems.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>100% remote working available.</p><p><br></p><p>If this is a challenge you are interested in, hit APPLY NOW for immediate consideration.</p>
